output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF: 11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Directly refers to Marcel Ciolacu, who is a presidential candidate (Position 3).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - Posted on Facebook/Instagram as a paid advertisement - Reached between 100,000-124,999 impressions - Significant spend (800-899 RON) - Targeted at a large audience (500,001-1,000,000 people)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Explicitly mentions the presidential elections - Promotes Marcel Ciolacu's candidacy - Expresses confidence in his victory - Aims to influence voters with messages about "unity, progress and solidarity"
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a campaign message, not journalistic content - Posted by PSD Brasov, a party organization - Contains campaign messaging and electoral goals
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication - Contains structured campaign messaging - Has CMF number - Is a paid advertisement

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Has official CMF number - Direct promotion of presidential candidate - Paid distribution on social media - Clear electoral messaging - Posted by official party channel - Large reach and significant spending - Direct call for electoral victory
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Brașov, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, prin postarea cu ID 550408210951641 pe Facebook. Postarea, realizată ca material publicitar plătit (800-899 RON), promovează candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU și solicită în mod explicit votul pentru acesta în alegerile prezidențiale, atingând un public între 100.000-124.999 persoane după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul conține număr CMF (11240017), confirmând natura sa de propagandă electorală.
